translations: n．尊敬，敬意：对某人或某事表示尊敬和敬意的行为或态度。
v．尊敬，敬重：对某人或某事表示尊敬和敬意。

sentences.sentence: I can remember at the start of the season. After my third match, he stopped to me by the street, he kneels down, and he did reverences to me!
sentences.translation: 我还能够记得赛季之初，在我的第三场比赛后，一个球迷在街上截住我，他居然跪下来向我致敬！

sentences.sentence: Every man's life is sufficient. But thine is nearly finished, though thy soul reverences not itself but places thy felicity in the souls of others.
sentences.translation: 每个人的生命都是足够的，但你的生命却已近尾声，你的灵魂却还不去关照自身，而是把你的幸福寄予别的灵魂。
